title: RWE and AM Green Ammonia sign MoU to supply 250,000 tonnes per year of ammonia from India
description: RWE Supply & Trading has signed an MoU with AM Green Ammonia B.V. for the long-term supply of up to 250,000 tonnes of green ammonia annually from its Indian plants. The ammonia will be produced using carbon-free energy sources and meet EU standards for renewable fuels. Deliveries are expected to start by 2027.
